Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory196.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Alright, that's the end of our mission here. Hooray! Time to enjoy the holiday!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After checking his gear, Kamui collapsed to the ground, lazily asking our opinions like a Labrador.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "But the HQ asked us to be on stand-by... I don't think we should enjoy ourselves too much...", 5: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Just tell them we are maintaining the equipment. What do you think, Commandant?', 5: '1'}
{2: 'What equipment?', 3: '2000', 4: 'You definitely look suspicious...', 5: '2002'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I think he is referring to the arcade machines we saw earlier.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I think he wants us to all play arcade games together.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee, how are the supplies?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "All good. We still have Vera here. She has access to Kurono's express transport lines.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So this "enjoyment" you are talking about... Is just playing games together?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Correct! Plus, I asked Miss Celica to secretly modify the game. I'm sure it's more fun than ever now.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Somehow I am a bit worried with the "modify" part.', 3: '15', 4: 'Have you played it yourself?', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "What's there to worry about? Oh, I was quite surprised with the technologies she used though.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Of course not. It's more fun when we play it from scratch together.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'So, what do you think?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't mind going.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's necessary to have a break from work occasionally. The HQ had already sent other teams to take over. We just need to not become addicted to the game.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What do you think, Commandant?', 4: '2'}
{2: "If Lucia's alright with it...", 3: '22', 4: 'Just let Kamui do what he wants.', 5: '23'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Do what I want... I'm not a kid, Commandant.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Let's hurry up then. There are six of us, including Commandant. We can split into two teams of three.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "You never mentioned teams... Anyway, where's the sixth member you are talking about? There are only five of us!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh, Camu was also showing a lot of interest. But he is already in the game now.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Really? Can't he wait?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Don't worry, he seems to be just watching the opening animation again and again.", 4: '3'}
{2: "Doesn't he have anything better to do...", 3: '29', 4: 'We better not keep him waiting then.', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I think maybe Camu just likes that animation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is also a good opportunity for us to get along with Camu. Good thinking, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Not again?', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Just when Kamui was about to take the team forward, another voice from behind stopped everybody once again. Kamui complained as he turned back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "You're up to something fun, aren't you? Mind if I join?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'It\'s "us", Vera.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Under the sun were two Constructs wearing environment-specific Coatings. Vera and Karenina never stopped quarreling. They seemed to be on an operation together.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Karenina, Vera, are you doing something together?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "That's none of your business. But I heard you were going to slack off! Count me in!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'It\'s "us", remember?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Screw you!', 4: '2'}
{3: "They didn't seem to be getting along at all. In fact, I felt they were about to start fighting in the next moment."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We are going to try this game that Kamui recommended. I don't mind if you come along, but can the game fit so many of us?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Shouldn't be a problem. I don't see any limit on the instructions, and we could do two teams of four.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Okay then. Speaking of which, you mentioned teams... Does it mean that we will play against one another in this game?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Celica said it was more like a traditional role-playing game. I guess the teams are just to compete with each other for fast clearing or something similar.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Shall we spice it up a little then? Like, the winning team can make the losing team do one thing.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are you planning something evil again, Vera?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'No way. I said just to spice things up a little for fun.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Somehow, Vera kept staring at me while she was talking.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Hmm... It's up to Commandant to decide.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alright, but the request must be reasonable.', 3: '52', 4: "If you don't mind.", 5: '53'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Reasonable, huh... Fine, let's just keep it that way, Commandant of Gray Raven.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I think it's okay, because I have no plan to lose. Aren't you the same, Commandant?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'm okay either way. Can we just go?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yeah, let's go!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I never thought we would all be playing a game together...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I think it will be a good experience.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "After arriving at the arcade game center, everyone followed Kamui's instructions to create their characters and put on their connectors."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Kamui, how are the teams assigned?'}
{3: 'Lee asked Kamui in the dark.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Celica said the system would randomly assign players to teams.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Does it mean that we may be playing against Commandant?'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Yeah, it's possible. But I'm not going to give in, even if Commandant is my enemy."}
{2: 'Maybe just a little?', 3: '65', 4: "Don't blame me then.", 5: '66'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "There's no such option in the game, Commandant."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Hmph, you sound very confident, Commandant.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Anyway, this game is fairly free, but bear in mind that players cannot kill important NPCs.'}
{3: "It's a common practice in many open world games. Some NPCs will mess up the entire game if they are killed by players."}
{3: 'Kamui completed some basic game settings. The arcade machines stared.'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Starting... Loading game—Le*end...of...H*ro...X'}
{3: 'After some stuttering electrical sounds, a mysterious title was displayed.'}
{3: '"Legend of the Executor - GR" was the title. Moments later, it was blurred and a few more words showed up, getting larger and larger...'}
{3: '"Romance of the Kingdoms — Overlord\'s Conquest".'}
